resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105565</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105565</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086753</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Political Systems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Politische Systeme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Systèmes Politiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistemas Políticos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistemi Politici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολιτικά συστήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistemas Políticos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A collection of downloadable video clips on the theme of Political Systems, with guiding questions for students. Clips are drawn from the following PBS WIDE ANGLE documentaries: "To Have and Have Not" (2002), "A State of Mind" (2003), "Ladies First" (2004), "Border Jumpers" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung downloadable videoclips auf dem 
Thema der politischen Systeme, mit leitenden Fragen für 
Kursteilnehmer. Clips werden von den folgenden PBS 
Weitwinkeldokumentarfilmen gezeichnet: "haben und haben nicht" 
(2002), "ein Geisteszustand" (2003), "Damen zuerst" (2004), 
"Rand-Überbrücker" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection de clips visuels downloadable sur 
le thème des systèmes politiques, avec des questions de guidage pour
des étudiants. Des clips sont tirés des documentaires 
GRANDS-ANGULAIRES suivants de PBS : "pour avoir et Démuni" 
(2002), "un état d'esprit" (2003), les "dames en premier" (2004), 
"cavaliers de cadre" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção de grampos video downloadable no 
tema de sistemas políticos, com perguntas guiando para estudantes. 
Os grampos são desenhados dos seguintes documentaries LARGOS do
ÂNGULO de PBS: "para ter e ter não" (2002), "um estado de 
mente" (2003), "senhoras primeiramente" (2004), da "ligações em 
ponte beira" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di video clip downloadable sul tema
dei sistemi politici, con le domande guidanti per gli allievi. 
Le clip sono estratte dai seguenti documentaries GRANDANGOLARI 
di PBS: "per avere ed avere non" (2002), "un Dichiarare della 
mente" (2003), "signore in primo luogo" (2004), "ponticelli del bordo"
(2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των τηλεκατεγραφόμενων τηλεοπτικών 
συνδετήρων στο θέμα των πολιτικών συστημάτων, με την καθοδήγηση 
των ερωτήσεων για τους σπουδαστές. Οι συνδετήρες προέρχονται
από τα ακόλουθα ντοκιμαντέρ PBS WIDE.ANGLE: "Για να 
έχει και να έχει όχι" (2002), "ένα κράτος του μυαλού" 
(2003), "κυρίες πρώτα" (2004), "άλτες συνόρων" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de clips video downloadable en el 
tema de sistemas políticos, con las preguntas de guía para los 
estudiantes. Los clips se trazan de los documentaries 
GRANANGULARES siguientes de PBS: "para tener y tener no" (2002),
"un estado de la mente" (2003), "señoras primero" (2004), "puentes de
la frontera" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086753</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105565</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/political-systems</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
